verses.name: Psalms 22:16
verses.text: For dogs have compassed me: the assembly of the wicked have inclosed me: they pierced my hands and my feet.

verses.name: Psalms 22:17
verses.text: I may tell all my bones: they look and stare upon me.

verses.name: Psalms 22:18
verses.text: They part my garments among them, and cast lots upon my vesture.

verses.name: Psalms 22:19
verses.text: But be not thou far from me, O Lord: O my strength, haste thee to help me.

verses.name: Psalms 22:20
verses.text: Deliver my soul from the sword; my darling from the power of the dog.

verses.name: Psalms 22:21
verses.text: Save me from the lion’s mouth: for thou hast heard me from the horns of the unicorns.
